privacy_policy_header1: Basic Policy for Personal Information Protection
privacy_policy_header3: Regarding the Use, Provision, and Management of Personal Information
privacy_policy_desc1: When operating this website, we take into account the protection of users' privacy, and handle personal information appropriately based on the 'Yabu City Personal Information Protection Ordinance.'
privacy_policy_desc2: You can use the regular content on this site without revealing any personal information. However, when soliciting or submitting opinions via e-mail, we ask that you provide your name, address, etc. In such cases, personal information will be collected to the extent necessary to achieve that purpose.
privacy_policy_desc3: Collected personal information will be used within the scope of the purpose of collection specified in advance, such as responding to inquiries and application procedures, and will only be used when the consent of the user has been obtained, or when there is a provision in laws or ordinances, etc. Except as stipulated by the City Personal Information Protection Ordinance, personal information will not be used or provided for any other purpose.
privacy_policy_desc3_sub1: In addition, this personal information is strictly managed by each department in charge, and measures are taken to prevent leakage, loss, falsification, etc. Personal information that is no longer needed will be promptly disposed of and deleted.
